description:
Akizuki Kaoru is the first of a succession of identically named men who seek the services of BPS. All of them share a traumatic childhood experience locked up in a phone booth, and all of them have a liking for Isabelle Adjani.
This particular Akizuki is a salaryman working in the PR department of Eibin Electronics. His wife has passed away, and his only son is currently staying with his wife`s parents.
name: Akizuki Kaoru
